meanings.definition: To have been assessed or evaluated by an expert.
meanings.sent1: The painting was expertized by a skilled art critic.
meanings.sent2: The car was expertized by a mechanic before being sold.
meanings.sent3: The cake was expertized by a professional baker, and it was deemed delicious.
meanings.sent4: Her skills were expertized by the coach, who saw great potential in her.
meanings.sent5: The document was expertized by a handwriting analyst, revealing the true author.

meanings.definition: To have been certified or verified by an expert.
meanings.sent1: The jewelry was expertized by a gemologist to confirm its authenticity.
meanings.sent2: The signature was expertized by a forensic expert to determine its validity.
meanings.sent3: The toy was expertized by a toy expert, who declared it safe for children to play with.
meanings.sent4: His knowledge was expertized by a renowned scholar, earning him recognition in the field.
meanings.sent5: The antique was expertized by an appraiser, revealing its true historical value.
